'''MEP: Arwen's Choice''' is a jigsaw puzzle in the ''[[Middle-earth Puzzles]]'' series, released in 1997 by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]]. The art is an [[:File:Ted Nasmith - Arwen's Choice.jpg|original work]] exclusively created for use with this puzzle.
